name: Jump Slash Jump
description:
In a world of balls, you lived peacefully.

That was until the day a mysterious floating box appeared.

"You shall become my servant or fear my fearsome power"

You won't bow before anything...

...not even the law of gravity !

Grab your invisible sword...

... your jumping boots ...

... and prepare for an epic battle !

Jump Slash Jump is a small game of jumping and slashing

Made with löve2D

many thanks to Jérémie for the read back
